1110111100011110 1001001110011110 1 -> sum: 1000001010111101, cout: 1

1010001000011001 0100011010101100 0 -> sum: 1110100011000101, cout: 0
1010011011111100 1111011001110011 1 -> sum: 1001110101110000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
